entry.title: RAINFALL WARNING , Placentia
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 10:35 PM NST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Saturday: Rain at times heavy or freezing rain. High 9.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Freezing rain or ice pellets beginning early this morning then changing to rain at times heavy this morning. Fog patches developing this morning. Rainfall amount 15 to 25 mm except 40 mm in areas of heaviest rain. Wind southeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 increasing to 40 gusting to 60 this morning then to 60 gusting to 80 near noon. High 9. Forecast issued 05:30 AM NST Saturday 24 December 2022

entry.title: Saturday night: Periods of rain. Low plus 3.
entry.summary: Periods of rain ending before morning then partly cloudy. Fog patches. Amount 5 to 10 mm. Wind southeast 60 km/h gusting to 80 becoming south 30 gusting to 50 this evening then southwest 20 overnight. Low plus 3. Forecast issued 05:30 AM NST Saturday 24 December 2022

entry.title: Sunday: A mix of sun and cloud. High 6.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Fog patches dissipating in the morning. Wind southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40. High 6. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:30 AM NST Saturday 24 December 2022

entry.title: Sunday night: Showers. Low minus 2.
entry.summary: Showers. Low minus 2. Forecast issued 05:30 AM NST Saturday 24 December 2022
